name: sccccmanagement
description: Management utilities for SCCCC written in GAS

scripts.dev:rapid-test: npm run dev:push && echo "\nDev HEAD (rapid test) updated. Open: https://script.google.com/macros/s/1vxnOkgujRS9wKml2m0qcykeUhHcqI1e7UUTLdngcoGGtx4lCnsDfSSKc/dev\n"
scripts.dev:create-version: npm run set-dev-env && npx @google/clasp version "Dev Version $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.prod:create-version: npm run set-prod-env && npx @google/clasp version "Production Release v$(npm pkg get version) $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.prod:redeploy-live: npm run set-prod-env && LAST_VERSION=$(npx @google/clasp versions | head -n 1 | awk '{print $1}') && npx @google/clasp redeploy AKfycbx9sAdtVj0GstkRqp7oJBhevDzW5h52pIG3lHR31qIRRQ1G6oa0eAiycf1D59ssWMcY "Production (v$(npm pkg get version)) - $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.prod:deploy-live: npm run prod:push && npm run prod:create-version && npm run prod:redeploy-live && echo "\nProduction deployment updated to v$(npm pkg get version). Access via: https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbx9sAdtVj0GstkRqp7oJBhevDzW5h52pIG3lHR31qIRRQ1G6oa0eAiycf1D59ssWMcY/exec\n"
